segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her knee-length dress sways slightly, but her focus is solely on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel surprised by her obliviousness to the water cascading over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows larger beneath her, but she doesn't seem to notice it at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she's in her own little world, untouched by the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight filtering through the window makes everything outside look serene and perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, thereâ€™s danger lurking, unnoticed and unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR
